name: Mysteries of the Undead: The Cursed Island
name_original: Mysteries of the Undead: The Cursed Island
description:
Mysteries of the Undead: The Cursed Island is a casual adventure game developed by 8Floor and Go Games. It came out on 04-04-2014. It was published by Viva Meda. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Mysteries of the Undead: The Cursed Island on PC.
